com.ge.predix.mobile.platform

Interface WindowView


  • public interface WindowView
    Created by Clifton Craig on 6/17/16. Copyright GE 6/17/16 The WindowView is an abstraction which the Predix Mobile SDK uses to load webapps and web pages into the container. The SDK will use this abstraction to show dialogs add a decorative spinner spinner to the UI when the application is in a wait state, and/or receive app notifications. The implementation should manage the window where all of these interactions are to occur.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      CustomSchemeHandler customSchemeHandler()
      Returns a CustomSchemeHandler that the SDK will use to open URLs with unique protocols.

      Called by the SDK to load Webapps/web pages into the WindowView.
      void receiveAppNotification(java.lang.String script)

      This method is invoked by the SDK when the application enters or exits a waiting state.
      WaitStateModel waitState()
      Called by the SDK to interrogate the current wait state.

    • Method Detail

      • loadURL

        void loadURL(java.lang.String url,
             java.util.Map parameters)
        Called by the SDK to load Webapps/web pages into the WindowView. The URL is given and any querystring parameters are supplied as a Map.
        Parameters:
        url - The URL to the webapp or web page to load
        parameters - query string parameters

      • receiveAppNotification

        void receiveAppNotification(java.lang.String script)
        The SDK will invoke this method to pass notifications from the container into the WindowView. The JavaScript which is registered to handle the notification is given as a parameter.
        Parameters:
        script - A String containing the JavaScript to function execute in response to the notification.

      • showDialog

        void showDialog(java.lang.String message,
                java.lang.String requestedRoute,
                java.lang.String requestedMethod)
        Called by the SDK to show a dialog.
        Parameters:
        message - A String containing the message to show in the dialog prompt.
        requestedRoute - A String containing the pmapi service route that was requested which spawned the dialog.
        requestedMethod - A String describing the HTTP method used with the requestedRoute.

      • waitState

        WaitStateModel waitState()
        Called by the SDK to interrogate the current wait state. You should return the last wait state given from the call.
        Returns:
        a WaitStateModel representing whether the application is waiting.

      • updateWaitState

        void updateWaitState(WaitStateModel waitState)
        This method is invoked by the SDK when the application enters or exits a waiting state. The waiting state is indicated by the WaitStateModel.
        Parameters:
        waitState - A WaitStateModel indicating whether the application is waiting can be given.

      • customSchemeHandler

        CustomSchemeHandler customSchemeHandler()
        Returns a CustomSchemeHandler that the SDK will use to open URLs with unique protocols. (Non http/https protocols)
        Returns:
        a CustomSchemeHandler used to handle custom URL protocols requested from the PM web app.
